column3: “🚀...I'm sooo high, Good mornin!!..Out of Chronic Pain and Out of Sight with the Bruce!.. 11 STAR!!...Feelin' Up-Mellow, Mindful, Calm, Motivated and Energized.. ready to-gooo.... Feels like a Stress-Free day😍   Inflamation is  Reduced and PTSD is Pacified.. no AM mind chatter while tokin BB😙.  I'm Totally Baked after 2 HOOKA water bowls for Wake 'n Bake.. SO Smiley, Focused and Fun, the Peaced-Out energy of BB enh...”

“🍆💪 Bruce Banner lives up to it's name! Chem Soda F1 x Starfighter x Coal Creek Kush x Strawberry Diesel! What a fantastic lineage. No wonder this strain has such a wild blend of effects. This sativa-dominant hybrid gives you an intense cerebral blast of motivation and creativity, followed by a very powerful body high. I was very surprised with how I felt from one hour to the next. Bruce packs a punch and is an amaz...”

“BEST. WEED. EVER. 
Happy af, clear enough headed, can get things done, good sex. It's a bright and happy high!”

“My hands down favorite strain! I'm one of those smokers who typically gets couchlocked and lazy easily, so most of my experiences have been occasionally inconsistent with reviews for some hybrid strains. Typically a 1/4 a week smoker, but I swear I smoked a 1/2 of this in a week because it was so good and I was even able to get more done than usual, as well what felt like driving with a pretty high degree of focus (o...”

“Picked up a eighth of this today from a reliable dispensary. Instantly I noticed that my attitude was happier focused and most importantly made me feel better.if you can't deal with your stress or problems I mediately took a hit of this and it fixed it within five minutes I highly recommend the strain;for those who are having anxiety ADD problems ADD ADHD bipolar disorder PTSD PMS mood disorders Tourette's syndrome O...”

“Dr. David Banner: Physician, scientist, cannabis? Radiation hasn't changed my body chemistry, but something has vastly altered my brain chemistry... This shit is potent! I even stopped writing this review to watch the Quiet Room episode of The Incredible Hulk. Sweet, diesel-esque buds covered in shiny trichomes with such high THC percentage it wouldn't be unreasonable to leave a vacancy in the headspace where yr ego ...”

“🚀...This Sativa-Social, Indica-Ideal Hybrid is the perfect balanced mellow/energetic up-mood-elevating Medicine!..Quite ethereal head-in-the-clouds, perfect for cloud watching over the Sedona vortex...Enhances my intuitive readings, crystal healings, body-mind-spirit chakra balancing/healing work...Inspiration, Motivation, Patience, Compassion, Peace, Trust,  Wisdom, Tranquility, Grace, Beauty, Love...BodyMelt Alert...”

“I love this Colorado Classic! It has everything I want in a smoke. Looks great, smells good, tastes fine, and most certainly does the job! Bruce Banner is kinda heavy hitting and fast acting, coming on with a heavy buzz that lingers off slowly.”

“More specifically, I'm smoking on some Bruce Banner #3 from Golden Leaf, my favorite local pot shop in Steamboat Springs, Colorado.

Bruce Banner has always been on my top 5 overall favorite buds list and every time I smoke some, I remember exactly why it's there.  An indica-dominant, but still very energetic, heady strain that contains strong flavors and smells of coffee, skunk, and just plain funk, is exactly what ...”

“i just got this strain and i can 
truly say its one of my favs”

“Looking for a nice hybrid? Well I found it for you. 

Bruce Banner is a hybrid strain that will leave you feeling good all over. The sativa and indica balanced each other out which left a feeling of clarity and upper body relaxation.

Took about 10 min for the full effects to kick in. Starts with a nice head high and a little boost of energy. Then it trickles down to the body. The high sat around my shoulders the who...”

“I will parrot others and call Banner fruity tasting and that it has a powerful sativa high that may or may not be green.  One thing is for sure - Bnr will become your friend.  This one excels for me.  Also give Flo a try.  ns”

“Location: L'Eagle 
THC: 24.43%
CBD: Unknown 
THC-A: Unknown 

Additional Notes: I have had a few people tell me this was one strain I really needed to try and damn were they on point! 

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: These beautiful and vibrant green, crystal covered flowers are perfectly formed. They have big fat calyx and deep redish brown pistils. They, as with all buds from L'Eagle, were also dri...”

“This has been my favorite strain to date!!

It was originally suggested to me by the dispensary budtender to help me sleep. I found that my brain got way too stimulated for it to work for that - so for awhile I put it away, and almost forgot about it in favor of my Purple Kush which was my bedtime go-to at the time (now I've switched to Purple Candy which puts me out like a light).

Then one day, after a minor surger...”

“This review is on Bruce Banner by Elevate.  WA
29.5% total active THC

I'm happy to say this version lives up to all the expectations.  Beautiful medium sized buds, light green In color with fiery red hairs.  Strong aromas of diesel and pine will make love in your nose holes while total relaxation takes over.  Really a great strain for any kind of free time, it will make you appreciate everything tenfold.  The only t...”
“My favorite!!!  Great for lovemaking...multiply your orgasm x2 or 3.”
“🍦.. PTSD Zapper & Perfect Anytime Herb..Bruce is the🍒on top" of my fav summer Munchy
column4: Oregon's🍓 Tillamook IceCream!!..Perfect Creative Companions=Sweet Summer Stoniness
column5: luv the Super High THC this Az grow carries
column7: even after 3 HOOKA bowls. I receive such  Amazing Pain & Depression Relief from this strain😍I purchase quite often. Thank you
column8: Bryce🎵 of YHS"C" for your Outstanding  rec...”"

column3: “My favorite!!!  Great for lovemaking...multiply your orgasm x2 or 3.”
“Bruce Banner #3 has an earthy flavor with a floral fragrance. The high is strong with an uplifting effect I liked it very much.”

“A friend of mine gave me 1gram just to taste.  So, as usual, I take a puff or two before bed.  Well, it took about 5 minutes and my heart started to race and I felt so energetic I wanted to clean my home....top to bottom !!   The flavor mild, no harsh burn of the throat, burned quickly.  I took another couple of puffs and soon I became axious, light headed, and a bit dizzy.  It took me three hours to finally fall asl...”

“The aroma and terps coming of a single 8th of this flower had me excited from the first wiff. After getting it home I ground up a gram in the Space Case. Not only was the flower covered in trichomes, it was dried and cured perfectly. I smiled and knew this was grow with love. Snapped right off what little stem was present and ground up to a nice fluff. Kief was all over the inside of the grinder. After grinding it th...”
“I am dealing with kidney issues and this has been my only source of pain relief. I am so grateful to this strain right now.”

“The doctor is in for now, but lets try and keep him on the happy side... Feeling insane amounts of stress, anxiety and maybe even a little angry...? Perhaps feeling a little green? well lets get ya'll informed of whats going on, Bruce Banner is a sativa dominant strain with a very hefty euphoric and creative buzz, being a stronger sativa dominate she can be very helpful with relaxing the body, but also able to give a...”

“completely blown away... most defiantly lives up to its reputation... amazing on every level... very much a sativa that mirrors indica behavior... so after smoking a bowl I decided that Bruce Banner is my new boyfriend... it is LOVE LOVE LOVE all over :)”

“completely blown away... most defiantly lives up to its reputation... amazing on every level... very much a sativa that mirrors indica behavior... so after smoking a bowl I decided that Bruce Banner is my new boyfriend... it is LOVE LOVE LOVE all over :)”

“Well, not by choice but I re-upped with Bruce again and STILL N0 complaints... lighter green, somewhat dry flower Caked, an I mean Covered in trichomes like the ßlizzard of ‘78. (Southwest 0HIGH0 blizzard) Strong & Heady effects consume with warm fuzzy body feeling accompany anxiety reliving effects. Top-Shelf Cannabis(period) (pictures included)”

“🤘🤜 Bruce Banner is a unique sativa-leaning hybrid with some of the most amazing alpha-pinene I have had in a long time. It has amazing creativity boosting properties and such a nice mood lift. I was very impressed with how I felt after the first bong rip. The taste was amazing; very diesely but smooth and with a subtle sweetness. I love this strain and recommend it to anyone looking for a clear headed and productiv...”
“Bruce banner is strong haha had me eyes red and burnin like I was mad at the air. But a great strain definitely can taste and smell the og. And diesel like smoke. Great for sleep stress or pain.”
“Picked up some of The Hulk" from Barbary Coast
column4: which has definitely transformed from the last time I had Bruce Banner. Hits hard upfront and sticks around. Very euphoric
column5: but active. Felt properly medicated after 1-2 pulls. Dense
column8: perfect for your favorite glass piece. Takes the best attributes of all three parents.”"

column3: “Nahhhhh lmaooooo bro I was smacked we smoked it as a blunt mad energetic relaxed felt good. Yeah I was very hyperactive it kinda hard to get tho.”
“This is a tasty and fun strain! A solid high with very sweet taste!”

“Have now tried both in flower-form, as well as the concentrate of good ol Mr B Banner! Flower I would give 4✨ simply bc I expected a euphoric green smackdown! — but it took my vaping his oil to truly understand the dr/awe! My humble respect, Mr Banner.. I will try not to confuse you with the jolly green giant!
•••••🙈🙉🙊•••••”
“One of the best highs I've had out of smoking.”
“This is a tasty and fun strain! A solid high with very sweet taste!”
“Nahhhhh lmaooooo bro I was smacked we smoked it as a blunt mad energetic relaxed felt good. Yeah I was very hyperactive it kinda hard to get tho.”
“Wonderfull buzz I took a five star shit after smoking”

“Purchased from Greenside Rec in Des Moines
Flower: very sour diesel looking nugs. Light green, a little on the leafy side, but gorgeous nonetheless. 
Smell: Diesel, pungent and sweet notes. 
Crumble:  Fluffy and voluminous. Very nice. 
Burn: Even top shelf quality burn. 
Taste: Definitely a diesel pungency with hints of sweet strawberry and a little citrus/ginger. Like Sour D and Strawberry Cough had a baby. 
High: O...”
“Exceptional stuff that hits hard and can definitely get you zombified in no time - great to watch tv/movies and play games - not so great to remember schoolwork lol.”

“i bought a one gram bud which i imediately rolled into a joint and smoked with my freinds very strong at first then it evens out nicely its got an almost sweet taste and very dank smell if your worried about getting caught this would be the wrong shit for you”
“Fucks me up. Great for pain, is euphoric and almost - but not quite - couchlocky. Pick up snacks before you light up!!”
“Exceptional stuff that hits hard and can definitely get you zombified in no time - great to watch tv/movies and play games - not so great to remember schoolwork lol.”

“sweet and sugary buds that smell like strawberry diesel with a hint of lemon and definite fuely undertones. Two very tasty strains make up this awesome hybrid. Strong sativa like, and Bruce Banner turns into the Hulk leaving you in a daze about a half hour later as it's indica effects kick in. physically and mentally relaxing, a great strain for unwinding at the end of the day. Great strain for appetite stimulation a...”

“I still smoked the same amount that I normally do. But this strain in my personal opinion got me more high than most strains I've smoked. The high was really uplifting and exciting. This strain is probably better for the day. But overall I liked this strain.”

“i bought a one gram bud which i imediately rolled into a joint and smoked with my freinds very strong at first then it evens out nicely its got an almost sweet taste and very dank smell if your worried about getting caught this would be the wrong shit for you”

“I loved this strain because I found myself smiling, cleaning the house, and just enjoying life.  Some of the other strains (I'm just learning) have left me with a couch high" or sleepiness.  This one is great and exactly what I've been looking for.”"
“Fucks me up. Great for pain, is euphoric and almost - but not quite - couchlocky. Pick up snacks before you light up!!”
“Wonderfull buzz I took a five star shit after smoking”

“So high am I? Why yes, yes I am so high right now. I feel like I am moving in slow motion in the regular paced world right now. my body feels heavy but relaxed. I love the smell of this strain. very woodsy/forest sweet. and the taste is nice, not harsh flower at all. love the sweet smoke on my lips right now. Not sure when the sativa side will kick in for me, but I am loving the relaxed side at this moment.”

“Really fabulous, anti-depressant strain. Pure, glorious, sunny joy, that just lifts you up from the doldrums and takes you far away from the stress. God what a magical plant. 

I totally understand the universal appeal of this beauty, because it's so pleasant, relaxing, and overwhelming calming. Happiness, goodness, love, calm, peace, kind, and light. Time slows down to a succession of gorgeous moments. No better str...”
“Been taking this strain just recently, it has help with my back pain and muscle spasms. No longer need Advil or Ibuprofen. This is the real deal.”

“Normally,  I take a bit of time to give a full, eloquent, and complete review of a strain, when I decide to do one. I mean, I really wanna do it with this strain, but...

I just smoked a giant bowl (via bong).. and now I'm completely absorbed by Devo, dancing around like crazy to it.

Are you sold, yet?”

“To preface this bad review, I'll mention that I'm prone to anxiety and paranoia on some high THC strains. I'm already being treated for anxiety, depression, and PTSD. This baby takes my anxiety and cranks it up a notch or 5. I've given this several tries. I can see how some people without my predispositions would find it energizing and make them productive. -cyf”

“i LOVE This Strain! Great Pain Relief. Long Lasting maybe 5-6 hours. High was a Nice Strong High for about an hour and about 2 hours of Good buzzing. You can taste the Diesel in this. Its a Great Social Smoke. Great for anxiety. If you got trouble mingling with folks. This is Good, Kind of opens you up and make s you comfortable not just in your physical being, but emotionally as well.Hit this Halloween Day and as a ...”

“Uplifted, energized, focused, and creative...lasts and lasts with no couch-lock at the end, and zero to minimal munchies.  I can’t say enough about this strain I think I’m in love.  Cleaned my house, went to the gym...perfect daytime buzz!”

“This comes in second to my beloved Blueberry Muffins. It has just the right initial body high that I adore but goes mostly head high pretty quickly. The taste is fruity but crisp. I did not feel the usual FEED ME" that I do with strains heavy on indica. I got ish done. I can see this one being good for ADD
column6: and general wellbeing. A good day high. I did not feel out of control of this high at any point....”"

column3: “definitely in my top 10. Had BB a couple times but most recent was amazing. Caryophylene terpene was very prominent and very enjoyable.  fresh rosin press blew me away! yum!”

“I am sad to say that Bruce Banner and I just did not get along. I am a lightweight, so I try to take it easy with a new strain, but after two hits of this I was completly, mind numbingly baked. Two grams did last me a long time because I could only consume it in such small doses. I just sat there, feeling completly floaty and spaced out. I could only focus on one thing at a time, and that thing was usually food. my h...”
“Very strong medication.  Very calming for a Sativa strain, similar to J1 but not the staggering THC count.  No jitters, no paranoia, no couch lock unless you over do it...  Great daytime med.”
“I barely remember the last time I did the banner.  This 1/4 from TGS is rated @25% Thc and brings back the mellow high memories and why I like it so much.  Fully functional and chill.  Lovely  ns”

“Bruce Banner delivers exceptional flavor with a potent head high. 

After vaporizing Bnr" through a Magic Flight vaporizer I instantly feel focused

column1: For patients with depression I recommend small doses through vaporization too much Bnr can you paranoid.
For consumers that are mentally fatigued or with patients with muscle spasms I recommend small doses to get a nice and relaxing affect.

column3: “To whom it may concern...  This is a very strong, very effective medication for pain.  It does not require a lot to get the needed effects. Taste and aroma are both top shelf.  I will keep this one on hand as a go-to from now on.  If you over do this one it can have similar effects to Gorilla Glue #4.”
“Very strong medication.  Very calming for a Sativa strain, similar to J1 but not the staggering THC count.  No jitters, no paranoia, no couch lock unless you over do it...  Great daytime med.”

“Been taking this strain just recently, it has help with my back pain and muscle spasms. No longer need Advil or Ibuprofen. This is the real deal.”

“I’m a fairly new smoker, second time around. First time in the 70’s. What a pleasant difference. Treating pain now. Love the Bruce Banner! Great for pain relief. Creative, euphoric feeling after about 30 minutes. Able and willing to clean house and feel pleasantly distracted in my mind! Just a few thoughts from a Grandma.”
“Taste is alright, it’s a good staple strain I feel like I can depend on for a more positive mood. For me gives more of a head-high than a body high.”

“A sweet tooth total day strain bruce banner will wake you up and overload you with happiness very little other effect besides just utter ignorance of all other moods besides happy. Decent mind buzz and munchies.”
“mega creeper when it hits you you feel happy euphoric and ralexed. Good for people who get anxious really easily”

Child of my two amazing strains 
OG KUSH X STRAWBERRY DIESEL 

It gives you energy and has a lovely taste to it . 

Keeps get you through the day without worries . 

Treated it as my am sativa 

It’s one to not turn down! Cmon it’s HULK”

This strain made us very talkative and creative. I definitely recommend for an overall good experience. This one will 100% be a re-buy.”

“im typically a lightweight, so i dont have to smoke very much before im high. it usually only takes one or 2 bowls of something to get me goin, but i shit you not, i took one hit, ONE HIT, of bruce banner and i was higher than a kite🍀”
“This strain allows for pain relief while enhancing my concentration and ability to focus. The aroma and flavor has deep citrus notes. It smells like...orange rinds and loose leaf tea.”

Great taste, a face melter! 

SUPER appetite booster! 
MUNCHIES!!”

“I normally don’t write reviews but this floor was FIRE!! I am everyday smoker so my tolerance is high. After 3 good hits off my bong I was done, it had everything I wanted in a strain. My body was all nice and tingly I had a super head high. At one point I felt drunk and giggling like a little girl. A must try, they have it as a sativa hybrid I feel it’s way more indica .”

“Have no fear. Hit Bruce Banner hard and hang on for an enjoyable ride. 

I am most definitely a light weight. I attribute this to the fact that I typically use CBD Rich strains. Light weight or not, Bruce Banner is gonna sit you down and let you become a mere speck in the universe. You will feel it's effects quickly, but a blanket of euphoria will be slowly pulled over you as you settle into the high. Have some water...”

While most sativas overwhelm my head easily without ideal circumstances, I can smoke this whenever (even night) and feel really nice and at peace. Great to handle my nausea, and it doesn't make me feel real hungry like other strains can; just enough to help me eat. Also inspires me to write (hence a review, heh). I do have to be a little bit careful if I become ...”
“One hit and feel great already.”
“I’m very happy right now💗💪🏼🤗☺️😊”

“I wanna slow clap it out for Bruce Banner.

The strain delivers. What do you want? Relief from muscle pain? You got it. Wanna laugh? Now you're a gigglepuss. Wanna sit down and work on a puzzle for a hour? Okay, maybe you won't be as quick, but you will still enjoy every moment. I always feel creative and just delighted on this strain.
Not to mention aches and pain fade into the background.

If I could only get Bruce...”

“This is a strain that whenever I stumble across it I always pick it up.  The first wave hits and it cracked me out of my shoes and flopped on the couch.  After about 15 - 20min there is always this second wave that hits that takes my thoughts and elevates them to the clouds.  The normal constraints I have on thought are removed and I can let my creativity surge.  The tase is actually pretty great.  Hints of pine and ...”

“I wanna slow clap it out for Bruce Banner.

The strain delivers. What do you want? Relief from muscle pain? You got it. Wanna laugh? Now you're a gigglepuss. Wanna sit down and work on a puzzle for a hour? Okay, maybe you won't be as quick, but you will still enjoy every moment. I always feel creative and just delighted on this strain.
Not to mention aches and pain fade into the background.

If I could only get Bruce...”

column4: is a top shelf strain yielding record high thc percentages (when grown at its potential).

column2: leaving little color definition and white blankets of trichromes line the leaves and stem. Smells sweet
column3: but also yields that 'DANK' smell! 5/5 - Defiantly worth a shot if you've yet to try
column4: but do note - this strain is a heavier indica. Preferably a night time smoke

column3: “Good strain. A bit one note . Has a nice relaxing mellow high but it sort of just stays right there if no matter how much you smoke. It's a solid night time strain or something for when you feel like relaxing but it's definitely not a strain that's going to bake you like a fucking cake , best to find something more potent than Bruce Banner. Like I said solid strain, just not anything too exciting about it.”
“excellent relaxing feeling.. perfect for chill nights”
“each pull of a joint is like your being hull smashed definitely a potent strain hulk smash”

“Man, I've never felt so strongly about a weed strain thatch had to type a review but I am high as hell. This is some great stuff; first strain I've ever actually felt myself grow creatively while being high. However I couldn't even finish a bowl of this before being spooked by some noise while I was smoking outside(it's not legal where I am); I was that God damn high/still am. Good shit 5/5”
“okay got really high and did not get paranoid or anxious love the flavor but ate everything in sight”

“apt name. super frosty. had a lingering migraine for over a week and this kept me mostly productive during it. it was easy to over do it and slip into ps4 mode, but a hit at a time every few hours kept me clear and not sick. new favorite since gsc is hard to come by and high priced.”

“Although I didn't give this strain 5 stars, the consistency of this strain has me convinced it will grow on me until it hits the top. Another good even and balanced feel. I an uplifted, but not paranoid feeling with a tingly body buzz. I also had enough focus to write some reviews of what I am...er...was medicating with. I have a felling this will become an all time favorite of many.”

“wow this strain makes you feel so chill. Although one time I passed out I was just so relaxed haha. Its a pretty great steain through through the vape pen.  defintly helps with anxiety as it relaxes the mind and body!”
“Way to much hype for what people make it I think, I did not get any of these affects. Complete opposite I was zoned out completely and in deep thought. To to much in my head”
“definitely one of my favorite strains!!!! this makes me super giggly and happy. great for a hike or chilling and watching Futurama lol”
“Seems like anything to do with the Hulk is super solid.  I have nothing but good things to say for this.  Well done!”
“This stuff will have you wanting to rip off your shirt...but then return to your spot to smoke some more...it’s that good. Pungent and a heavy hitter, even for the habitual user.”
“Super high THC, beautiful green buds. Definitely sativa dominant.”

“My gram of Bruce Banner from Terrapin seemed a little light, which seems common with Terrapin, but considering their  normally lower prices I can tolerate it. The buds were small and light green.Taste was earthy with a diesel finish and a hint of sweetness. Gave me a nice relaxed body and buzzy head high. Paired well with The Deuce.”
“Love the energy you can get after smoking this strain!! Great taste, smells sweet, great for leaving on a California road trip... Definitely will get this again and again...”
“Great balance of physical/mental stimulation and relaxation.”
“All around works great for me. Perfect for pain, stress, anxiety with a bit of focus & energy when smoked in small amounts. At nighttime, when smoking more, it's good for relaxation too.”
“very good strain”

“This is a gem of a smoke  a strong deisel taste going down but very easy exhale because of the overwheming diesel taste can cause a dry mouth so make sure u got plenty of liquid but will leave you feeling very relaxed n chilled great for daytime as dosnt leave u stuck on the couch”
“awesome strain, smoked for the first with a glass bong. the high is great and defiantly was feeling good. will smoke again”

“This strain is Delicious! Has a super fruity taste and aroma. When grown right it has beautiful light green buds with orange pisitil covered in trichomes! Very high THC%! Usually see it at 28-30%! Good body effects and head high! Great Hybrid!”

“Free & up lifting. Sweet & floral”
“The cut I got of Bruce is phenomenal. Beautiful contoured buds, super packed with trichomes, and an awesome high. Always has me feeling Right"! Top 5 of all time!”"

“Coming in at 33% THC (picked up from the Herbal Collective in Gresham, OR) this strain is amazing! I love stronger head highs, and with the high THC% I was hoping it would do just that...and it certainly did. 

Makes me feel really happy, and in a great mood. I find myself thinking about random things and instantly smiling. I also like how it has made my body feel relaxed but not so much that I can’t move.

I decided...”
“Really enjoyed this one. Da dabs dabbed da dada.”

“The Bruce is a great bud... slight, sweet OG taste and smell. Face pulsing heavy-hitter at first, evens out nicely into great head/body space. I noticed constantly receiving nice 'sighs of relief,' indicating lower stress/pain levels for me, then off to get busy. Very functional, calm yet uppy experience. Excellent med.”
“Good high, enjoyed it.”
“This one I like more than Incredible Hulk because it has an indica with the sativa, so it's like your fighting your inner beast!”

Relaxed body & mind, focused, creative.
Sometimes the practice is hot and sweaty, sometimes intensively mellow, introspective.”

“Beautiful buds covered in crystals.Tastes sweet,and earthy.Very strong buzz,that gets you up there,without shutting you down.”

“This is perfectly named. In my personal experience this strain made me completely care free. All of my stress and an anxiety melted away. Great buzz from head to toe. Makes me feeling like I’m floating in water. It did not make me couch locked ( like an indica) or motivated(like a sativa). BB is a perfect balance.”

“I used this to wake and bake and it was perfect. I felt energized focused and ready to tackle my day. If also left me relaxed and patient enough to deal with anything the day had to throw at me. I recommend this for day time use.”
“Only flower that relieves pain, mine & body.”
“For day top 5 . Might stop a new smoker in place extra relaxing”
“Bomb Ass Smoke!!! This shit has me focused and stoked!! Very clear heady high for me,some really good frontal numbing! Silver Surfed 2 bowls and I’m gone to the 🌚.”

“The nano-drone hovered silently outside the open window. The sound of typing bounced off the walls as white rabbit filled the kitchen with a sense of certain doom. A crack pops and Hunter S. Thompson falls back against the cold tile flooring. From the side of the exposed skull emerged two Cannabisian Fairies from the pineal gland. They immediately flew off to their mission. The targets, Bill & Hillary Clinton. The or...”

“This may be my new favorite strain!! Awake and energetic but mellow! Fairly clear headed but with a sheen of happiness lay across. It’s beautiful and fun. Great day time social strain. Also, fun to be in such a nice mood lounging around!”
“STRONG sativa effect while still being relaxing. Made me kind of paranoid”
“Great strain super strong very relaxing while still blazed out of your mind”
“Mellow head high”
“Good strain for mornings”
“Great taste and aroma. Good vibes. Love it!”

“This strain is simply exceptional! I have been smoking a small variety of strains lately, however, this has been a new edition to the ‘regulars’. 
A very euphoric high that allowed me to stay focussed and complete tasks around the house without any issues. I typically smoke in the evening to avoid loss of efficiency with completing tasks but this Bruce banner strain kept me focussed and clear-minded.
Excellent strain...”

“loved it, very up lifting. very euphoric.
kept me mellow and calm all night.”
“i love this strain!!! going in for more now. it gives me a nice head high that I'm looking for 👍”
“This bruce banner hybrid is very very good.It give me me a uplift,relax and happy creative feeling. It help me with my medical needs.”

“This strain wakes you up and makes you feel very focused. 

Uplifting for mood, not a couch lock feeling/sedative feeling.

More social/talkative”

“Downtown looks so blue. / 
You think they can see it too? / 
The residents there...”
“Bruce Banner is true to it’s hybrid roots! Love how this strain gives you that uplifted feeling without the sleepiness.”
“Smell is strong lemon/citrus, good for day time - high functioning -”
“Very pleasant high. Definitely helps with stress and appetite on my end. Doesn't leave me on an anxious edge either which I quite enjoy. Tastes solid too.”
“Very tasty sweet aroma great body high”

“this is a mind fuck off a stain, me and my mates smoke this lass to and to my delight it was just like crack it made me go from waddling because of and injury to running like god. i would highly recommend this strain if you are injurer or recently going through a divorce.”

“I've had this both in flower and oil but this review is for the Platinum Vape Oil.  Nice relaxing full body euphoria to begin almost force field like.  Extremely good chronic pain relief which is always welcome to me.  I actually got energetic for once then will make you focused and lazy.  My mood was very happy with this Oil.”
“One of my personal favorites. A good strain to study on.”
“This strain was very delightful. Definitely very pretty, fluffy/dense buds,  orange amber hairs. Beautiful. 😍”
“Love it!  Diagnosed with depression, panic disorder, and arthritis, and it addresses the issues and leaves me with a nice buzz. Bruce does me just fine and dandy.”

“Definite hard hitting and immediate impact. More of heady high which relaxes into sedative awareness and deep thought processes. I sincerely enjoy the creative aspects and for myself these are an underrated aspect of this strain.”
“Perfect earthy taste and stigma”
“LOVE THIS!  Perfect for a day of light work in the back yard or just chilling to some good tunes. Worth a try if you're looking for pain relief while still wanting to stay active.”

“This has slowly started to become one of my favorite  go to for all times of the day. I find I get really creative in the kitchen after a nice session of the B.B. I like finding these gems but then it all depends on who where and when..”
